name: Mystery Mine
description: Dynamic adventure in the Mystery Mine: dangerous monsters and bosses, ancient magic and decisions, on which many lives depend! Can the ordinary aborigine save the world?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, XP, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB DirectX: Version 9.0
